Text: The Telial stage is one of the stages in the life cycle of a parasitic heteroecious fungus.
Triplets:<The Telial stage
1:
--------------------
Text: Telial stage:  It is discernible by the formation of large teliospores that the fungi produces to overwinter.
Triplets:<Telial stage
2:
--------------------
Text: Telial stage:  The telial stage of heteroecious parasitic fungi is spent on the secondary host plant.
Triplets:<telial stage
4:
--------------------
Text: Telial stage:  Spores are released from the telia in the spring.
